txt.en: 'We lost some of our boys near one of these a few nights ago.'
You have arrived at the location on the map, but Artamir is not here
'And go back empty-handed?'
'It looks empty to me.'
'There's nothin' to find! The swamp'll have covered everything anyway.'
Instance: Missing in the Marshes
Giant Norbog
'Maybe.'
' I say we keep at it.'
'It seemed... it seemed so near....'
Break Artamir from his reverie
'I am quite all right now, [placeholder].'
'My mind felt as foggy as this place, but it is much clearer now.'
Continue your search for Artamir. Did he come to this place?
You survived the onslaught of the ferocious creature, but where is Artamir?
You have found Artamir, but he stares into the water as if entranced, and does not notice you
You are determined to learn if Artamir still lives, and have followed the markings of an Orkish map to see if it will guide you to the missing man of Gondor.
You have nearly arrived at the location marked on the Orkish map.
From a distance, you think you can see the figure of a man standing among the reeds.

'Oh... what... what is it...?'

Artamir blinks sleepily, and shakes his head. When he speaks, his voice is thick, the words indistinct.

'[placeholder]... is that you? I did not... expect to see you so... so soon. But where am I? How did I come to be here? I must have been dreaming, but I did not sleep! I remember seeing lights in the darkness, beckoning....

'This place is dangerous, [placeholder]! We should get out of here, and at once! I am fortunate you found me!'
You are making your way through the Dead Marshes to the location marked on the Orkish map.
Defeat the creature and learn what befell Artamir
You have found Artamir, but he stares into the water as if entranced, and does not notice you.
'Let us return to my camp, [placeholder]. I am going to abandon this foolhardy errand before it kills me!'
Does a figure stand alone among the reeds to the south?
The location marked on the map has proven to be the nest of a giant creature, and it has claimed the lives of many Orcs. Did it also put an end to Artamir's story?
Break Artamir from his reverie
'I have always said you were a fool.'
Find the location marked on the Orkish map
'I say you are the fool to believe it!'
'Do you hear that? I was right!'
'What is so foolish about it? I do not see anything that can stop us.'
'Even now the darkness belches forth from the Black Land!'
Continue south-east past the Orc patrols to the location marked on the map
'The swords of Men are sharp. They will not abandon the fight just for fear of the dark.'
'You worry for naught. It is the Age of the Orc... let all Men tremble!'
You have not yet found Artamir, but you do not wish to give up the search. Perhaps he is just ahead.
You are approaching the location marked on the Orkish map
Listen to Artamir's decision
'What is it?'
'Keep your distance! The creatures build these in the swamps.'
'I don't see nothin'. We should go back.'
